content: skill level beginner level 1 wool-ease® article #620 2 colors 11 balls total a 620-232 wood print 6 balls 972 yards multi b 620-402 wheat 5 balls 985 yards solid crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm work 2-row pattern in bands of alternating color crochet edging to finish **available in two versions ** 10190 two-color afghan 1 *cwe-2colorafghan pdf modified february 2004* uses abbreviations 70406ad striped two-color crocheted afghan 2 may 2008 words are written out published as a free lion brand flyer lb #62426 12/02 also available on joann com p358192 two color afghan 3 pa00132 two-color striped crocheted afghan 4 also available as free leaflet in joann stores *two-colored striped crocheted afghan* joann idea ©2006 jo-ann stores increase *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www lionbrand com/crochet-pattern-two-color-afghan-1 html 2 http //www lionbrand com/crochet-pattern-striped-two-color-afghan-1 html 3 www joann com/two-color-afghan/p358192 html 4 www joann com/two-color-striped-crocheted-afghan/pa00132 html
